name: Kid Eternity and Mr. Keeper Don't Kid with Crime!

description:
Exploding from the pages of the Ultimates, comes Ultimate Thor! Don't miss the superstar team-up of JONATHAN HICKMAN and CARLOS PACHECO as they go back to the beginning and tell the origin of Thor, Loki and the rest of Asgard!

Ragnarok has descended and Asgard sits at the edge of the end. What will become of Thor and the Warriors Three? And what exactly does Baron Zemo, mysterious commander for the Nazis, have to do with it all? Ultimate Comics Thor brings you the untold story of Thor's thunderous debut!
name: Do You Lack Faith, Brother... or Do You Believe?

description: After hundreds of years, the Sith Empire has returned to the galaxy, determined to crush the Republic that sent them into exile. For young Sith, Teneb Kel, it is his only chance to rise above his lowly beginnings as a slave and prove his worth to the Dark Council. Yet their mission for him is unexpected. He will not hunt Jedi, but rather, a fellow Sith--the Emperor's apprentice!
name: Blood of the Empire, Part 1 of 3

description: Everyone's favorite anti-hero continues the quest for his secret origin (so secret he himself doesn't even know it) to drug war-torn Mexico, where even the billion-dollar bounty hunters of The Org, the mysterious super villain underground, fear to tread. But instead, he discovers an even more formidable threat: the newest murderous Marvel sensation, the bad guy you'll be talking about for years, or possibly minutes. Are you prepared for the senses-shattering debut of...THE DON OF THE DEAD? (Hint: No. You're not.)
name: Corpse Messaging

description: The best-selling Archie wedding series continues with The Married Life, two ongoing series each featuring one of Archie's two possible futures, one married to Betty and another married to Veronica. First, in 'Archie Loves Betty: Saturday' (by Paul Kupperberg, Norm Breyfogle, Andrew Pepoy, Various) Archie and Betty fight to make their dreams come true in Manhattan. But back in Riverdale, Mr. Lodge will stop at nothing to break the man that broke his daughter's heart. Meanwhile, in 'Archie Loves Veronica: Dear Dilton...' (by Paul Kupperberg, Norm Breyfogle, Joe Rubinstein, Various), the Lodge's push to buy out Pop Tate's is pushing Archie and Veronica's marriage to its limits as the mayoral race continues. Will an old foe step in to help Moose step up?

This is the 4th issue of the Pacific Presents series and this issue is an anthology comic, featuring several different stories by several creators.

The first story is ""Take Two Slugs and Die" which features an evil gunslinger who terrorizes Tombstone, Arizona during the late 1800's and invariably crosses paths with a reluctant hero who unknowingly receives help from his son and an alien sent to Earth as punishment for his crimes on his homeworld.

The second story is "The Shell Game" and features a hoteldetective who encounters a case of murder and mistaken identity.

The third story is "The Wildly Plausible Plight of Eerie Smith and Walter Weary" in "Split Decision" and is the continuation from Issue #3 of Pacific Presents where a portal is accidentally opened into another dimension by a Physics student and the campus janitor, resulting in the arrival of an alien humanoid whose intentions appear to be questionable.
name: Pacific Presents Issue #4

description:
This first issue in the Puma Blues volume begins the set-up, with nominal story detail, of a U.S. Fish and Wildlife research biologist hired by the U.S. Military to conduct video surveillance and tracking of animals that have been recently mutated following the explosion of a nuclear device in New York 5 years prior to the setting of the story ( which takes place in 1997).

He essentially lives alone in the woods of Massachusetts , withminimal contact with humans viavideo communications, includinga family member, the US Military, and the Dept. ofFish and Wildlife, the latter two who give him instructions for his tasks.He is also kept up to date with world news via teletypeand video.

Creatures such as flying manta rays appear over the skies of the forest, problems arise around the world involving the Soviets and their space efforts now that the U.S. is struggling to survive its nuclear holocaust.
name: The Puma Blues Chapter One
Shadows on the Wall
A New Clear Day
Indistinctions
In the Empire of the Senses
We Talk
Sunday
Alie Nation
Deconstruction
Lost in My Circle
Time Will Crawl

description:
Last Gleaming," part 2 of 5. Spike and Buffy are finally reunited (*sigh*) and lucky him -- he's discovered the source of all her problems, and it's not Angel. Now Buffy must revisit the place where love was indiscriminate, the Scoobies were formed, and Hell's mouth was closed for good.

Whedon and Jeanty launch readers into the finale of Buffy Season Eight, promising more adventure, twists, and turns. Bonds are tested, lives altered, and oh! -- the fate of humanity hangs in the balance.
name: Last Gleaming, Part Two

volume.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer Season Eight

name: The Dreaming
A Sense of Distant Touch
Ruts
Man, Ray
Double Burn
Thin Skin
Admist Wings
Eat or Be Eaten

description:
Often compared to Edward Gorey and Charles Addams, Blab! mainstay Richard Sala has developed a distinctive narrative and visual style that can best be described as gothic humor. Possibly the closest thing to a super-hero series put out by Fantagraphics, "Peculia," in his regular comic Evil Eye, has been charming readers for several years. Peculia, the intrepid heroine, is a precocious and rebellious adventurer who fearlessly wanders through a world filled with zombies, monsters and more, assisted only by her trusty butler. In addition to collecting all the "Peculia" stories to date (including from the first two, out-of-print issues of Evil Eye), the Peculia collection includes a brand-new six-page, painted, full-color story in which Peculia happens upon a sinister doll shop. The Peculia collection is an excellent introduction to Richard Sala's idiosyncratic universe of noir-ish mystery, suspense, and occasional whimsy.

"Peculia" is a Trade Paperback comic collecting Issues #1-9 of the title character, published by Fantagraphics Books.
name: GN

description: In a world where bionics are a part of everyday life, every man, woman, and child has had technological enhancements grafted into their bodies. One citizen, Nathan Spencer, finds himself on the run from prison and certain execution. His path has one end, the metropolis known as Ascension City!

Story Titles

  • Titania Biggs by Harm Bengen
  • Who's Who? by Fernando Calvi
  • The Friends of Susana: Raquel by Danide
  • Trixie: Orgasmic Odyssey Part Three - Little Big Bang by Basta
name: Titania Biggs; Who's Who?; The Friends of Susana: Raquel; Trixie: Orgasmic Odyssey Part Three - Little Big Bang

description: Having survived the Technis Imperative the original members of the Teen Titans agree to reform the team, this time with five additional, hand-picked members. Plus, one longtime Titan decides to leave Titans Tower for greener pastures.
name: Getting It Together; Inspiration; Bad News

description: In a rare moment of downtime, the Titans spend an evening together, enjoying each other's company. But while everyone is in a jovial mood, Donna Troy's feelings of disconnect from humanity may only be the beginning of a much larger problem -- one involving the Dark Angel, and multiple earths!
name: Interludes; Shifting Gears; Who is Tara Markov?; Super Friends

description: "The Devil for Dinner" with the crew of the Haunted Tank.
name: Meet the Devil for Dinner

description: Jughead becomes "Mr. Idea Man" to help a costume shop drum up business with a unique way to guarantee a date night. As word of mouth spreads, will Jughead be a victim of his own success? Then, Little Jughead decides to "Send in the Clowns" to help Principal Weatherbee find a new car. Meanwhile, Ethel and Midge play a game of "Mix and Match," imagining what other romantic triangles would be like at Riverdale High!
name: Mr. Idea Man

description:
Lt. Murphy is the latest victim of the Shadowman's magic and Harry is out to avenge his best friend. Can Harry stop the killer in time or is he destined to be the final victim?

The Dresden Files: Storm Front careens toward its shattering conclusion loaded with all the magic, mystery and adventure that make Jim Butcher's novels a smash hit!

volume.name: Jim Butcher's The Dresden Files: Storm Front

description:
Whether you are a recent or long-time Green Hornet fan, this series of classic Green Hornet reprints will be enjoyed by fans of all ages! Featuring stories written by Fran Striker, these 40 page issues are re-mastered for the first time! Featuring a new cover by artist, Joe Rubenstein!

The stories featured in this comic were originally published in Helnit Publishing's The Green Hornet Comics #2 in 1940.

volume.name: The Green Hornet: Golden Age Re-Mastered

description: Veronica has "The Great Idea" to be a living model at the mall and shoppers flock to see her, but what happens when girls flock to see Archie model? Then, the audience cries "Don't Make A Scene!" as the gang takes to the stage to act out world-famous romances!
name: The Great Idea

description: After a furious storm rips apart their ship, Baltimore and Vanessa wash up on an island shore in the midst of a graveyard of submarines. While taking refuge they stumble upon a ruined plague ship--a vessel used to burn vampires--now entrenched in a grotesque and dangerous fungus.
name: Part Three (of Five)

description: Drifts presence has been discovered, and he must now choose between old allies and new. Can one final act of courage save his soul? Or has he gone too far toward darkness to ever hope of coming back? A colossal battle is brewing, and Drifts future has never been more uncertain!

The Allied Powers discover the Third Reich was more than they seemed, bent on world domination in the name of an alien race! The World Wars are on, as Private Charlie Gantic, is put back on the front line as our only hope, his atomic structure altered by our top scientists, and G.I. Gantic will stop at nothing to crush the invading alien forces! Plus: a bonus Paul Pope one-pager!

Image Comics is re-presenting 10 first issues as an introduction to some of our most acclaimed titles, with each debut acting as the perfect primer to its corresponding ongoing series and collected editions!

The roster for LIBERTY COMICS 2010 includes contributions such as: A new The Boys story by GARTH ENNIS & ROB STEEN, the first new Megaton Man adventure by DON SIMPSON in over a decade, an all-new Milk & Cheese story by EVAN DORKIN, a preview of The Contrarian by SCOTT MORSE, a new Conan tale by DARICK ROBERTSON, Boilerplate by ANINA BENNETT & PAUL GUINAN and "Why We Fight!" by editor LARRY MARDER.

Plus: all-new short stories by GEOFF JOHNS & SCOTT KOLINS, FRANK MILLER, GABRIEL B & FBIO MOON, PAUL POPE, JEFF SMITH, TERRY MOORE, DAVE GIBBONS, BRIAN AZZARELLO & JILL THOMPSON, ROB LIEFELD, COLLEEN DORAN and SKOTTIE YOUNG.

All proceeds from LIBERTY COMICS will benefit the First Amendment legal work of the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund!
name: Liberty Annual 2010

description: Spirits run high in the Mystery Machine as Scooby and the gang take a vacation to the Grand Canyon...until they run across Area 15! It was here that locals claim the government covered-up an alien spacecraft landing years ago...
name: The Aliens of Area 49; Repeat Offender; Costume Caper!

description: Sylvester was sure to get Tweety this time...until Granny brought home a little surprise the Tasmanian Devil! If Sylvester thought things were tricky before, wait until he gets a load of "Housebroken and Busted!"
name: Tweety, Sylvester, & Taz in Housebroken and Busted; Stone Rage; Dinner And A Show

description: Ever wonder what would happen if the Doom Patrol went up against Superman? Well, keep wondering...but we've got the next best thing!
name: A House Divided

description: In this new Ben 10 adventure, the Omnitrix has been destroyed! Ben must now learn to master the secrets of the new Ultimatrix and how to evolve his alien forms into even stronger versions!
name: The Ben 10 Alien Force Experience

description: One hundred thousand refugees scream inside the Carrier and are gone. Hawksmoor, Flint and Grifter disappear with them taken by a species of brutal, nightmarish creatures. River's growing powers as the Spirit of Information hid only a handful of Authority members. As they set out on an impossible rescue, a terrible history is uncovered and the mystery of Swift deepens.
name: Slaughter Moon

description: Kane and Lynch have killed their way into Europe in search of Osterman, the one responsible for the "open season" contract placed on their heads. But to what depths are these two killers willing to go in order to clear their names? And will it be in time for Kane to find his daughter?
name: The Killer Elite

description:
With one word - KIMOTA! - newspaper copy boy Micky Moran becomes the invincible, indestructible Marvelman! In 1954, MARVELMAN #25 began the saga of one of the most storied characters ever to emerge from the British comics market. Now, thrill to the adventures of Marvelman, Young Marvelman and Kid Marvelman as they take on enemy agents, mad scientists and more in this "best of" series!

  • Marvelman in "Magnetised Marvelman" from Marvelman #235 - February 15, 1958
  • Young Marvelman in "The Young Marvelman and Young Gargunza" from Young Marvelman #100 - July 16, 1955
  • Kid Marvelman in "Kid Marvelman and the Bad-Tempered Farmer" from Marvelman #108 - September 10, 1955
  • Marvelman Family in "Marvelman Family and the Atlantis Fable" from Marvelman Family #10 - September 1957
  • Marvelman Serial in "Marvelman and the Great Gargunza Mystery Part 4: Foiled Again... but..." from Marvelman #75 - January 22, 1955

Now, terror has something to fear and his name is Jack Cross! This massive special features JACK CROSS #1-4, a never-collected volume introducing Warren Ellis's one-man anti-terrorist unit Jack Cross and his special brand of violence and civil protest, gorgeously illustrated by Gary Erskine (THE FILTH).
name: 100-Page Spectacular

description: Kyle Rayner and Jade take the stage in this special collecting GREEN LANTERN #137-140. Now that Jade is back as part of BRIGHTEST DAY, take a peek back in time to when her relationship with Kyle was in full bloom!
name: 100-Page Spectacular
